headline: DuPont Named "Most Sustainable" in the Water Sector by World Finance
summary: DuPont Water Solutions has been honored as the "Most Sustainable in the Water Sector" by World Finance Magazine for its technology advancements in support of reducing the carbon footprint of water purification, conservation and reuse. The company was also recognized for the value of the Water Solutions Sustainability Navigator, a new digital tool created by DuPont to help water producers estimate and compare key sustainability indicators of various water treatment technologies.
